metadata.synopsis: A Bhaal Cultist in the Temple of Bhaal.

0.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
0.text: Do you crave my promised poison? Patience. Perhaps one day.
0.context: NodeContext: Assessing, weighing you up by eye in order to work out how to poison you

1.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
1.text: Oh, don't come to me for advice. I'd have poisoned Orin a tenday ago were I in your shoes.
1.context: NodeContext: Detached, doesn't really care if you live or not

2.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
2.text: So messy... All you really needed was a drop of adder bile. That would've done for Orin.

4.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
4.text: Hmmm. Yes, at your stature, with your constitution...
4.context: NodeContext: Assessing, weighing you up by eye in order to work out how to poison you

3.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
3.text: An ounce of hezrou bile, two spoons of wyvern blood, and a corpse flower's nectar. That would do.
3.context: NodeContext: Figuring out the solution to a problem

5.speaker: Unholy Assassin Rycke
5.text: The prodigal child returns - to duel Lady Orin, no less. I normally abhor theatrics, but that'll be quite the spectacle.
5.context: NodeContext: Detached, doesn't really care if you live or not
